content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Good afternoon, Maria. Thank you for visiting my apartment. I am looking to rent it out for the highest possible price. May I ask what your budget is for the monthly rental cost?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have a budget of 800 Euros. What do you suggest for the monthly rental price?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Based on the size of the apartment and the current market rate, I would suggest a monthly rental price of 950 Euros. This price would allow me to maximize my gains while still being competitive in the rental market. Is this price within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, it is. I can accept it. I agree to the price of 950 Euros. Thank you for your assistance.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: You're welcome, Maria. I'm glad to hear that you are willing to accept the rental price of 950 Euros. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to let me know. I look forward to having you as my tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
